description: You are fish-like, making dexterous manipulation with your hands extremely difficult.
You are bear-like, granting you raw power in exchange for intelligence.  Also, using a gun is extremely difficult.
You are deer-like, giving you the ability to move quickly and escape danger.  However, this takes a great toll on your body, and you don't think you should maintain this form for long.
You have no ability to cast any spells except the classless ones.
